articles.title: Google celebrates Day 2 of Tokyo Olympics with yet another Champion Island Games Doodle - India Today
articles.description: Google celebrated Day 2 of the Tokyo Olympics 2020 with yet another doodle on Champion Island Games. The interactive anime games have been designed by Tokyo-based animation studio STUDIO4°C.
